T = int(input())
for i in range(T):
    values = input().split()
    N = int(values[0])
    K = int(values[1])
    V = int(values[2])
    n_values = list(map(int, input().split()))
    difference = V * (N + K) - sum(n_values)
    if difference % K == 0 and difference / K > 0:
        print(int(difference / K))
    else:
        print(-1)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    (n, k, v) = map(int, input().split())
    l = list(map(int, input().split()))
    sn = sum(l)
    v1 = v * (n + k)
    v2 = v1 - sn
    ans = v2 // k
    if v2 % k == 0 and ans > 0:
        print(ans)
    else:
        print(-1)

import math
t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    (N, K, V) = map(int, input().split())
    Nl = list(map(int, input().split()))
    val = (N + K) * V
    s = 0
    for j in Nl:
        s += j
    r = (val - s) / K
    q = (val - s) % K
    if r > 0 and q == 0:
        print(int(r))
    elif r <= 0:
        print(-1)
    elif q != 0:
        print(-1)

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    (n, k, v) = map(int, input().split())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    total = (n + k) * v
    curr = sum(a)
    res = (total - curr) / k
    if res % 1 != 0 or res <= 0:
        print(-1)
    else:
        print(int(res))

MISTAKE = -1
T = input()
for _ in range(int(T)):
    (N, K, V) = [int(i) for i in input().split(' ')]
    n_integers = [int(i) for i in input().split(' ')]
    res = (V * (N + K) - sum(n_integers)) / K
    ires = int(res)
    print(ires if res == ires and ires > 0 else MISTAKE)

for i in range(int(input())):
    (n, k, v) = map(int, input().split())
    l = list(map(int, input().split()))
    p = n + k
    s = sum(l)
    w = p * v
    ans = w - s
    if ans > 0 and ans % k == 0:
        print(ans // k)
    else:
        print('-1')

for _ in range(int(input())):
    (n, k, v) = map(int, input().split())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    sum_a = sum(a)
    sum_v = v * (n + k)
    sum_deleted = sum_v - sum_a
    deleted_value = sum_deleted // k
    if sum_deleted % k == 0 and deleted_value > 0:
        print(deleted_value)
    else:
        print(-1)

for z in range(int(input())):
    (n, k, v) = map(int, input().split())
    arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
    avg1 = sum(arr) / (n + k)
    integer = 1
    avg2 = 0
    chk = 0
    while avg1 + avg2 <= v:
        avg2 = k * integer / (n + k)
        if avg1 + avg2 == v:
            print(integer)
            chk = 1
            break
        integer += 1
    if chk == 0:
        print(-1)

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    (n, k, v) = map(int, input().split())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    Sn = sum(a)
    kterm = v * (n + k) - Sn
    ans = kterm % k
    if kterm > 1 and ans == 0:
        print(kterm // k)
    else:
        print(-1)

T = int(input())
while T:
    T -= 1
    (N, K, V) = map(int, input().split())
    ns = list(map(int, input().split()))
    s = sum(ns)
    temp = V * (N + K) - s
    if temp > 0 and temp % K == 0:
        print(int(temp / K))
    else:
        print(-1)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    (N, K, V) = map(int, input().split())
    N_list = list(map(int, input().split()))
    total = V * (N + K)
    K_sum = total - sum(N_list)
    K_value = K_sum // K
    print(-1 if K_sum % K or K_value <= 0 else K_value)

import math
for i in range(int(input())):
    (n, k, v) = map(int, input().split())
    nums = list(map(int, input().split()))
    x = v * (n + k)
    y = x - sum(nums)
    z = y / k
    if z == math.floor(z) and z > 0:
        print(int(z))
    else:
        print(-1)

n = int(input())
for i in range(n):
    (a, v, k) = map(int, input().split())
    l = list(map(int, input().split()))
    g = sum(l)
    j = (a + v) * k
    m = j - g
    if m > 0 and m % v == 0:
        print(m // v)
    else:
        print('-1')

cases = int(input())
for case in range(cases):
    (length_remain, length_deleted, average) = map(int, input().split())
    number_remain = map(int, input().split())
    sum_number_remain = sum(number_remain)
    length = length_remain + length_deleted
    total = average * length
    sum_number_deleted = total - sum_number_remain
    number_deleted = sum_number_deleted / length_deleted
    if isinstance(number_deleted, float) and number_deleted.is_integer() and (number_deleted > 0):
        print(int(number_deleted))
    else:
        print('-1')
